item.title: Lateefa AlWaalan has been awarded the title of Saudi Arabia's EY Entrepreneur Of The Year
item.description:
Lateefa AlWaalan, the driving force behind the Arabic coffee startup Yatooq, has been crowned Saudi Arabia’s EY Entrepreneur Of The Year (EOY) for 2015. A panel of independent judges selected AlWaalan from a pool of eleven finalists representing ten different companies. Her entrepreneurial spirit, robust financial performance, strategic thinking, and positive social impact distinguished her as a leader.Â Fahad Altoaimi, EY’s Office Managing Partner in Riyadh and the Entrepreneur Of The Year Leader, emphasized that this award recognizes AlWaalan’s significant business accomplishments, innovative spirit, and contributions to her community...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lateefa-alwaalan-has-been-awarded-the-title-of-saudi-arabia-s-ey-entrepreneur-of-the-year/
